Summary: Bright blue light appeared at 90 degree angle then descended before it disappeared.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving home from 50 highway on to Todd George rd, when I noticed a bright blue light in the east appear out of nowhere. I was a very blue light and after it flashed it descended diagonally, it then disappeared. This light reminded me of a blue light that I saw once before about two years ago in Lees Summit. They were three blue lights then, but they ascended, and to an angle also.
trends: There have been 52 other sightings in Lee's Summit
There were no other sightings in Lee's Summit on or around August 1st 2012
